text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Predator 15 G9-593-73N6 15.6" Full HD G-SYNC GeForce GTX 1060 6GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16GB Memory 1TB HDD + 256GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Acer Predator 15 G9-593-73N6 15.6" Full HD G-SYNC GeForce GTX 1060 6GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16GB Memory 1TB HDD + 256GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the Acer Predator 15 G9-593-73N6 15.6" Full HD G-SYNC GeForce GTX 1060 6GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16GB Memory 1TB HDD + 256GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
